import React, { useContext, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import Search from "./Search"; import AuthContext from "./context/auth/Context"; const Sidebar = () => { const { logedin } = useContext(AuthContext); const [isLoggedin, setIslogedin] = useState(false) useEffect(() => { if (logedin) { setIslogedin(true) } }, [logedin]) return (
{ !logedin && 'true' }

); }; export default Sidebar;
